title: Vikings Sr Advisor Ryan Grigson on #92Noon!
description: Ryan Grigson, former Colts GM, is part of Kwesi Adofo-Mensah's brain trust, and he shares his role and mindset with PA and Charch on the 2022 Draft and the organization!
